text: totally get designing chic yet livable spaces - balance is key!

sometimes those flashy facades hide smart solutions tho! like ancient buildings retrofitted with techy comforts without interrupting street charm 😌 gotta love when old meets new but still keeps its soul intact!
keeps communities vibrant + honors heritage, love seeing that fusion!
new ≠ better; some charm gets lost in modernization tbh
balance helps but doesn't fix everything
systemic probs are real 😩 even so got find your own way ya kno? let little rituals n chill spots keep u sane amidst all da chaos 🌆🛀
art moments breathe fresh air into packed schedules 👩‍🎨✨
oh wow... gentrification hit us hard huh 😞
kinda miss when libraries were all 'shh!' 🤫📚
thrift stores have been real MVPs lately... can score designer pieces at way less 😅 everyone loves unique finds & your wallet gets some breathing space!
free gigs are cool but sometimes you gotta treat yourself!
even window shopping becomes strategic... hello diy & thrift flips!
late night cafe spots with impromptu jazz bands playing have their own special place... transforms your average evening coffee into something right outta movie scene! 🎷✨
yeah love those accidental quiet corners...feels like time travel!
found an awesome rooftop garden café...urban escape plus great coffee!
smells can be weirdly invasive... there's nothing like waking up thinking you're suddenly living above a bakery lol 😂
haha yeah once i was convinced there was a serious drama going down cuz of all the shouty 'no's next door...turned out just binge-watching telenovelas 😅 loud tv nights are real!
not gonna lie… everyone loves quaint little nooks but have y'all seen some side streets during fashion week here? pure chaos & zero charm when you're running late 🙄
love peace & quiet too... just not during runway season 😅
honestly tho... those 'serene' spots are kinda overhyped IMO 🙄
call me crazy but i think u can have both - comfy vibes at home & impromptu adventures 😌
precisely! nothing beats an impulsive weekend getaway
finally learned how to sew buttons! #selfreliance
did all laundry before running outta socks – major win!
dude making rice without it sticking or turning into mush - feels like gourmet skills every single time!
paris vibes are saying "you do you" - no rush when you're chasing dreams amidst rising baguettes cost 😅 let's live at our own rhythm!
seriously, go at your own rhythm – timings très overrated
careful's good but no one-size-fits-all rule really
everyone knits right? learned it ironically...now i'm hooked 🧶
kinda ironic, being into fashion design i've found hand sewing super therapeutic… like a chill zone away from all screen time! anyone else appreciate analog craftsmanship?
budgeting solo for paris living...that’s the real grown-up game changer!
house parties instead? making them chic again 😌🍴
everyone's talking adapt & survive tactics but aren’t we just normalizing getting less for more? time we address why our work doesn't pay off like it used too... isn’t it?
thought i'd be at some major brand by now... designing indie lines instead & kinda loving it!
never thought i'd geek out over fabric textures until design life chose me lol...
life's like haute couture - looks fab until you see the price tag 😅
feels like there’s more out there than just making ends meet... brainstorming next moves!
sometimes wonder if i'm crafting a masterpiece or just stuck tracing others' lines...
work glam ≠ actual glam... all glitter ain’t gold btw
always stash cash during those high season months!
always feels like feast or famine right? got friends freelancing who swear by having multiple side gigs - kinda like diversifying investments but for work… keeps things stable-ish lol.
totally get ya… balance's key!
side gigs are cool but ever felt they're just glorified overtime?
hobbies =/= automatic payday...takes actual biz skills!
yeah stress ain't worth it... looking for more chill vibes
lifestyle creep's real... higher paycheck = swankier fabric scissors ✂️😅 oops!
higher salaries don't fix money mismanagement... just masks it!
bills paid but living bland? no thanks 🌈💤
studied fashion design and now i'm sketchin' daily 🎨✂️
design world’s all abt adapting too - variety keeps it fresh!
nice theory but ever tried making clothes from scratch? not easy!
critical thinking’s great until you need actual hands-on skills – can't eat thoughts or wear ideas, just saying 🤷‍♀️
Fashion's frivolous until u need morale boosts & identity 😉
design flair might just trade well for those 'shiny' post-apocalypse essentials!
studied hard thinking it'd open doors - ended up kicking them down instead 😉 design life chose me lol
sometimes ya gotta ride those curveballs 🌀🎢
def see patterns from design school pop up when shopping. can’t help analyzing fabric quality & stitch work like "hmm that seam’s off"... turns every mall trip into a mini crit session lol
picking fabrics constantly - even got picky with bed sheets!
spontaneous fabric analysis while shopping - can’t help myself!
career content but yeah... sometimes wonder "what if?"
sometimes i wonder if those design theory lectures paid off... then again, seeing your work worn by others? priceless feeling!
the inspiration payoff beats college stress any day!
had to pin fabric with paperclips once during last-minute fitting lol
once "fixed" a dress w/ stapler magic during runway prep nightmare!
used earrings as shirt buttons once 😅
recent capsule collection launch was surreal - seeing your designs street-styled? best feeling ever!
getting things looking right whether on fabric or a plate does hit different! every stitch or garnish can flip the script from 'meh' to masterpiece 😅 control freak level 100 but so worth it!
aesthetic wins get applause sure, but hidden fixes shaping our daily digital smoothness? definitely underrated genius right there 👀 devs deserve some spotlight too!
crafted my first solo runway line recently - surreal feeling!
tasty's good but don't forget presentation!
design shifts perspectives - aesthetics meet ethics daily 🧵✂️
each collection tells a story tbh - clothes aren’t just fabric but convey deep messages & culture...it’s like visual poetry 🎨
crafting beauty with limits teaches resilience & innovation 👗💡
switched careers rn feels more like hitting pause than play...
fashion wasn't planned but sketching designs feels kinda movie-star glam too!
sketching's just the start... lotsa market research & trend analysis!
always mentally redesigning random ppl’s outfits while out... lol
fashion's kinda similar but def has its moments - fluidity’s key!
feels like waiting for paint to dry here too sometimes 🙄
definitely complicated - guys might struggle getting noticed while girls deal with quantity over quality? like navigating metro during rush hour lol
lol so true! gotta love that mystery match roulette 🎢🤷‍♀️
swipe fatigue’s real regardless of gender imo 🚇💔
fashion always felt right; stereotypes weren't stopping me
had moments doubting if design was too cliché for girls but creativity doesn’t box you in like that; sometimes ya just dazzle em with sheer talent 😉

fashion design's def seen as more 'femme' but let me tell you - that doesn't make things easier! still gotta fight for your spot under those runway lights, proving creativity ain’t got no barriers 🎨 gotta hustle whatever field you’re passionate about!
fashion's all mixing it up now...gender lines? pretty blurry too!
passion drives careers not genders, even fashion evolves beyond stereotypes...ever seen guys rocking skirts on runways lately? total norm-smashers! 👊
gender norms? pfft...design laughs at 'em!
started boxing recently – total rush! nothing beats hitting those bags after designing all day...
thought fashion was just sketches? think again... draping on mannequins feels more like engineering sometimes 😅 gotta balance creativity + tech smarts!
wow pc build? nice! flex those tech muscles!
fashion drew me in early... sketchbooks beat soccer any day!
still tearing up runways instead of playing fields!
industry progress but stereotypes still not totally unstitched...
society needs chill pills not milestone pressures... just saying 🙄
fashion design has its stereotypes too but thriving!
fashion seemed 'expected,’ found diversity though!
fashion's evolving but top spots rarely go female... frustrating tbh
yeah dood totally see more guys getting into design lately ✨but those exec positions?...still mostly old school chaps at top 😬 we're mixin' it up down here though!
and fashion? it’s all mixed up now... guys nailing womenswear design! 🎨👗
rediscovered sketching lately... totally get where you’re coming from!
totally feel ya! less pressure now & loving creative freedom pulumi
kinda became my own boss when it comes downs 2 designing clothes cuz who needs dating distractions anyway right lol
balance matters… gotta mix security & surprises!
idk…reddit isn’t exactly skill-building 😕
work’s not an only escape tho...
honestly... "me time" often means binge-watching series than soul-searching 😅
dunno guys... i picked up knitting after ditchin' dating drama & tbh it made me miss human interaction less 😅 feels like solo time got turbocharged—all that focus goes right into creating stuff!
hmm idk... still get side-eye as table-for-one 🤷‍♀️
love people-watching 😂 but wifi better than glares...
seems way off here… tons of artsy spots & events sans lovey-doveyness!
staying single keeps options open, still navigating those trade-offs...
honestly? solo travel > sofa cuddles... freedom's addictive!
who says settled equals better? 🤷‍♀️👀
settling's overrated... just enjoying my freedom here!
ugh why do peeps think life’s a race? i'll 'settle down' when life gets boring... which is never 😌 leveling up takes time!
"settling down? nahh... busy levelling up life solo-style 😎"
city hustle + diverse vibes = great life lessons 👌
nature’s cool & teaches patience but never underestimate street-style inspo from city crowds - best fabric patterns ever spotted just people-watching at cafes!
bursts of creativity from every street corner definitely shaped my lens!
tourist money's nice but RIP authentic vibe 😩
kinda miss old quiet corners nobody knew tbh
hype overshadows local charm tbh
coastal vibes definitely sneak into my designs...
yeah but doesn't always gotta be epic scale stuff shaping tales...
hometown doesn't define everyone... got other influences too!
sea air's missed but fashion’s hustle here feels right
hard disagree on birthplaces defining us... sure they influence some stuff but i think we're not giving enough credit to personal growth and choices later in life!
cozy corners over beach waves anyday...history wins
seaside vibe made me go-with-the-flow kind of person tbh
definitely influenced my design aesthetic too!
hard not to carry those southern blues into designs... color palettes & laid-back vibes stay with you! anyone else find their hometown influencing their creative side?
still get inspired by those endless blue horizons... creativity booster!

well i def get where stardustsombrero’s coming from... like sure we're impacted by lotsa stuff but can't deny those early vibes stick around... always feel at home hearing certain sounds yknow? totally agree though - way more layers to peeps than just geography!
